Organization.Name: Austin Police Department
Organization.History: The Austin Police Deparment is commmitted to protecting the safety and well being of the diverse Austin community. The city is divided into nine districts, and each one is overseen by a commander. The number of officers working in each district is based on that district's size and call volume.

WorldCrises.Name: Money
Medical Supplies
Construction Materials
Food/Water
Shelter
Donate Money
Volunteer
Human Error
WorldCrises.Description: An accident caused by improper operation of equipment or miscalculations
WorldCrises.Name: Natural Disaster
WorldCrises.Description: Severe damages caused by forces of nature, including hurricanes, tornadoes and earthquakes
WorldCrises.Name: War / Conflict
WorldCrises.Description: A crisis which involves two or more countries fighting against each other
WorldCrises.Name: Act of Terrorism
WorldCrises.Description: Using violence against civilians in order to achieve political, religious or ideological goals
WorldCrises.Name: Assassination / Shooting
WorldCrises.Description: Murder of one person or multiple people
WorldCrises.Name: Economic Crisis
WorldCrises.Description: A dip in the economy characterized by high unemployment, low prices, and/or low levels of trade and investment
WorldCrises.Name: Civil / Social Crisis
WorldCrises.Description: Conflicts that usually involve protests by one or multiple groups of people
WorldCrises.Name: Pandemic / Illness
WorldCrises.Description: Widespread, detrimental health effects
WorldCrises.Name: Intergovernmental Agency
WorldCrises.Description: An organization set up across multiple nations
WorldCrises.Name: Government Agency
WorldCrises.Description: An organization that is set up by and associated to a specific country
WorldCrises.Name: Military Force
WorldCrises.Description: The defense system of a country, including the navy, the army, the airforce and the marines
WorldCrises.Name: Intergovernmental Public Health Agency
WorldCrises.Description: An organization that seeks to promote the health and well being of those in need
WorldCrises.Name: Nonprofit, Humanitarian Organization
WorldCrises.Description: An organization that provides necessities and goods to those who need them, especially after a disaster
WorldCrises.Name: Corporation
WorldCrises.Description: A company that conducts a business of some sort
WorldCrises.Name: Institution President
WorldCrises.Description: The head of a public institution such as a university
WorldCrises.Name: Country President
WorldCrises.Description: The leader of a country
WorldCrises.Name: Celebrity
WorldCrises.Description: A generic catch-all for actors / actresses, singers, sports players, entertainers, etc
WorldCrises.Name: Politician
WorldCrises.Description: A person that deals directly with government issues
WorldCrises.Name: CEO
WorldCrises.Description: The leader of a corporation or a company
WorldCrises.Name: Humanitarian / Philantropist
WorldCrises.Description: One who is devoted to the promotion of human welfare through giving and volunteering
WorldCrises.Name: Dictator
WorldCrises.Description: The absolute leader of a dictatorial government
WorldCrises.Name: Civilian
WorldCrises.Description: Someone who holds an ordinary job
WorldCrises.Name: Military
WorldCrises.Description: Someone who is current serving in the military or is a veteran
